WorkItem.Description:
two proposals to improve HtmlConvert.ConvertTo in Html2Txt project (see attached patch) - currently new lines are only added at the *beginning* of paragraphs. It seems to me more logical to add a new line at the end of the paragraph. The same rule should apply to titles tags (h1, h2, ...) - for
  • I suggest : -- add a character at the starting tag -- add a new line for closing tag   So

    My title

    My parag

    • item1
    • item2
      would be converted to :   My title My parag item1 item2   Thanks for this project it's a great tool
